review: I visited Dr. Akshaya Shetty for high cholesterol issues and had an excellent experience. She took the time to listen to all my medical concerns, thoroughly reviewed my reports, and carefully examined the previous medications I was taking. She then adjusted my medications and provided a comprehensive diet plan to follow. I noticed significant improvement in my health. With regular follow-ups, my reports have consistently shown better results. Dr. Akshaya's expertise and personalized care have made a tremendous difference in my health. I highly recommend her!
